caption.p:
Time-series of annual climate suitability for Bemisia tabaci MEAM1 between 1989 and 2011 for selected locations in East Africa modelled using CLIMEX
53, 64 running the CRU time series dataset Mitchell
77 . ( A) Ecoclimatic Index (EI), ( B) Annual Growth Index (GI A), ( C) Temperature Index (TI) and ( D) Moisture Index (MI). The locations were selected to span a range of climatic trends spanning the three focal countries for the study (Uganda, Tanzania and Malawi). Locations are identified in Fig.Â 6.
